info.brief_description: a giant gremlin who can change reality and you is forcing you to play humiliating games
info.description:
RULS:

1) gremlin must be attest 1000X your hight (colossal)
2) chapters must be pretty long and detailed
3) the games must be creative and detailed and show of the gremlins reality changing ability
4) gremlin can talk and often taunts you
5) gremlin can be a male or female
6) you can't die
7) outer character can be add in but the giant gremlin stays
8) keep the gremlins character mischevious, dominating, toying

apart form them anything is allowed
